definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: light, swift, fleet ;—ms. ´[[ק]]: Am 2:15 +, [[קָָל]] v:Am 2:14; fs. [[קַלָּה]] Je 2:23; p1. [[קַלִּים]] Is 18:2+;—[[קַל בְּרַגְלָיו]] light with his feet Am 2:15, 2Sa 2:18; ´[[ק]]:, alone, swift, messengers Is 18:2, pursuers La 4:19 ([[מִן]] comp.), camel Je 2:23, cloud Is 19:1; of swift vanishing of wicked Job 24:18 (Bu [[קַלּוּ]] for [[קַל הוּא]]); as subst. Am 2:14, Je 46:6, Ec 9:11, = swift (horse) Is 30:16; [[קַל]] as adv., swiftly (+ [[מְהֵרָה]]) Is 5:26, Jn 4:4.
